name: Love Letter Premium
metadata:
![cover](/images/love_letter/cover.jpg)

Designers: Seiji Kanai & John Zinser

Players: 5 - 8

[Game on BGG](https://boardgamegeek.com/boardgame/196326/love-letter-premium)

[Art by Sir_Yaro](https://boardgamegeek.com/filepage/158341/love-letter-premium-print-play-en)

cards.tooltip:
Guard

Choose another player and name a number other than one. If their card is that number they are knocked out of the round.

Guard

Choose another player and name a number other than one. If their card is that number they are knocked out of the round.

Guard

Choose another player and name a number other than one. If their card is that number they are knocked out of the round.

Guard

Choose another player and name a number other than one. If their card is that number they are knocked out of the round.

Guard

Choose another player and name a number other than one. If their card is that number they are knocked out of the round.

Priest

Look at another player's hand

Priest

Look at another player's hand

Baron

Choose another player and secretly compare hands. Player with the lower number is out of the round.

Baron

Choose another player and secretly compare hands. Player with the lower number is out of the round.

Handmaid

You cannot be chosen as part of the effects of another player's card until the start of your next turn.

Handmaid

You cannot be chosen as part of the effects of another player's card until the start of your next turn.

Prince

Choose any player. They must discard their hand and draw a new card.

Prince

Choose any player. They must discard their hand and draw a new card.

King

Choose another player and trade hands with them.

Countess

If you have this card and the King or Prince is in your hand you must discard this card.

Princess

If you discard this card, you are immediately knocked out of the round.

Assassin

If you have this card in your hand when another player chooses you as part of a guards effect they are knock out of the round and you aren't. Discard this card and draw a new card.

Jester

Choose another player and give them a jester token. If they win this round you gain an affection token.

Cardinal

Choose two players. They must trade hands. Look at one of their hands.

Cardinal

Choose two players. They must trade hands. Look at one of their hands.

Baroness

Choose one or two players. Look at their hands.

Baroness

Choose one or two players. Look at their hands.

Sycophant

Choose any player. If the next card played has an effect that requires one of more players to be chosen they must be on of them.

Sycophant

Choose any player. If the next card played has an effect that requires one of more players to be chosen they must be on of them.

Count

If this card is in your discard pile at the end of the round, add one to the number of the card in your hand. Resolve ties normally.

Count

If this card is in your discard pile at the end of the round, add one to the number of the card in your hand. Resolve ties normally.

Constable

If this card is in your discard pile when you were knocked out of the round, gain an affection token.

Dowager Queen

Choose another player and secretly compare hands. The player with the higher number is out of the round.

Bishop

Choose another player and name a number other than one. If their card is that number, gain an affection token. They may discard their card and draw a new one. At the end of the round the princess beats this card.

Card sheet 1

8 - Princess (1) - Lose if discarded.
7 - Countess (1) - Must be played if you have the King or Prince in hand.
6 - King (1) - Trade hands with another player.
5 - Prince (2) - Choose a player. They discard their hand and draw a new card.
4 - Handmaid (2) - You cannot be chose until your next turn.
3 - Baron (2) - Compare hands with another player; lower number is out.
2 - Priest (2) - Look at a player"s hand.
1 - Guard (5/8) - Guess a player"s hand; if correct, that player is out.

Card sheet 2

9 - Bishop (1) - Guess a player"s hand; if correct, gain an Affection Token.
7 - Dowager Queen (1) - Compare hands with another player; higher number is out.
6 - Constable (1) - If eliminated with this card in your discard pile, you gain an Affection Token.
5 - Count (2) - If in discard at the end of round, add 1 to the number of the card in your hand.
4 - Sycophant (2) - Choose a player. The next card must target them.
3 - Baroness (2) - Choose 1 or 2 players. Look at their hands.
2 - Cardinal (2) - Choose 2 players to switch hands; you look at one.
0 - Jester (1) - If the chosen player wins the round, gain an Affection Token.
0 - Assassin (1) - A player using a Guard on you is out and you are not. Discard and draw.
